recordTypes.name: Application to Serve on a BCCC
Select Board Licenses: New Licenses (Alcohol & General), Annual Renewals (Alcohol & General), or Alcohol License Transfers
recordTypes.description: Click "SELECT" to see full list of licenses

recordTypes.name: Annual Building Inspection Request / Periodic Inspection Request
recordTypes.description:
The Massachusetts State Building Code (780 CMR, Chapter 1, § 110) requires that certain public use
buildings or spaces be annually and/or periodically inspected and certified by the local building official. 

Please complete this application and once we have received it through our online permitting system we will contact you schedule the inspection. 

These inspections usually take an hour or more, depending on the size of your building.

recordTypes.name: Septic Permit Application*
recordTypes.description:
INCLUDES: 
New System (New Construction) --- Upgraded System (Ex: 2 Bedroom to 3 Bedroom) --- Repaired System (Ex: Existing 3 Bedroom Failed, Install New 3 Bedroom - No change in bedroom count.) --- Single Component (Tank, D-Box, Sewer Line)

recordTypes.name: Northborough DPW -  Trench Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Use this record type for any excavation on private property, or in the Town's streets greater than 3-feet deep.

recordTypes.name: Northborough DPW - Street Opening / Roadway Access Permit Application
recordTypes.description: Street Opening / Roadway Access Permit Application

recordTypes.name: Septic Installer License - Renewal
recordTypes.description: PLEASE NOTE: Use this ONLY if you were licensed with the Town of Northborough the previous year.

recordTypes.name: Septage Hauler License
recordTypes.description: License to remove and transport septage and the content of privies and cesspools.

recordTypes.name: Northborough DPW - Drain Layer's Authorization
recordTypes.description: Drain layers are registered plumbers, and competent contractors licensed by the Town of Northborough, Massachusetts, and bonded to lay drains in the Town of Northborough, Massachusetts.  You must be a State licensed contractor or plumber to apply. In addition to your application for a new license (or a renewal), you will also be required to submit a copy of a bond to cover water, sewer, or drainage work in the amount of $5,000.  You will also be required to provide a certificate of Insurance naming the Town of Northborough as Additional Insured (no less than $1,000,000) for Public Liability and Property Damage.  New applicants must also provide three letters of recommendation.  The license, if issued, is good for one calendar year (expires 12/31).   It is only valid within the confines of Northborough, MA.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit - Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU) on single family lot
recordTypes.description: This application is for Accessory Dwelling units ONLY, whether attached to an existing building or as a separate accessory structure.  Any other project belongs on another application.

recordTypes.name: Well Permit
recordTypes.description: This application is for the Construction, Repair, and/or Destruction of a Private Well or Pump.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit - Minor MISC. Interior / Exterior (Solar not included)
recordTypes.description: INCLUDES: Siding, Roofing, Windows, Doors, Decks/Porches/Gazebos,  Insulation/Weatherization, Interior Demolition, Fence (7' Plus or Pool Barrier), Retaining Wall (4' Plus), Chimney, Tent (400 SF Plus and/or With Sides), Other

recordTypes.name: Northborough DPW - Water Service Request
recordTypes.description: Use this record type for any water service permit requests.  Examples are; New Service, Temp Service, Disconnect, Reconnect, Repair, Water Meter Etc.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit - PV Solar
recordTypes.description: INCLUDES: Roof-mounted Solar, Ground-mounted Solar, and ESS Installs

recordTypes.description: Temporary food establishment is a food establishment that operates for a period of no more than 14 consecutive days in conjunction with a single event or celebration.

recordTypes.name: Northborough DPW - Sewer Service Request

recordTypes.name: Special One-Day Alcohol License
recordTypes.description:
One-Day Alcohol License 

One-day licenses are required for events that are advertised and/or open to the public.  Please note that a person can only obtain a total of 30 one-day licenses per location in one calendar year.  You may use this application to apply for a license during consecutive days in the same location.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit - Renovation / Alteration

recordTypes.name: Commercial Building Permit - Sprinkler / Fire Suppression / Fire Alarm
Zoning Interpretation Request Form (No Fee)
recordTypes.description: A Zoning Interpretation Request is a written determination made by the Zoning Officer (Bob Frederico) that explains the zoning ordinances and by-laws for the Town of Northborough for a specific property based on the information presented in the request. These requests may include use determinations, questions on the placement or use of buildings or structures, and a variety of other zoning-related questions.

categories.name: Boards, Committees, Councils, and Commissions (BCCC)
categories.content:
Volunteer for a Board, Committee, Council, or Commission!
The Town of Northborough greatly values the active involvement of its residents. Serving on a Board, Committee, Council, or Commission is a rewarding way to contribute to your community, shape local decisions, and make a positive impact. We encourage all interested residents to apply for available positions. Your time, skills, and perspective are appreciated and vital in helping to guide the town’s gr
